name: Nostromo (WhoReallyCaresGames)
description:
NOSTROMO, a roguelike made for the 7DRL challenge. I attempted to meet the Berlin Interpretation as best I could while trying to remain in the small scope I had set for myself in the limited time I had.

CONTROLS

- WASD or Arrow Keys to Move (4 directional Movement)

- Space Bar to pass turn

- M to mute and unmute audio

- Esc - Return to Main Menu, Close program when in the main menu

OBJECTIVE

You answered the distress beacon of the merchant vessel Ulysses only to find the crew dead and the oxygen-depleted. Haunting the halls of the derelict ship is a vicious and previously unknown lifeform. Now you must escape down to the tenth level and find the emergency escape pods before your oxygen is depleted or worse.

Key

Smiley Face - That's you!

Є - the xenomorph lifeform

02 - oxygen tanks

> - level exits

NOTE:

I have also included a downloadable version of the game since, in my experience, WEBGL games have some weird problems. The downloadable version is exactly the same except for an additional splash screen at the beginning. There is a ReadMe file in the download that explains the controls as well.
